title: How to change a student to a teacher status at Google Classroom - Quora

response.answer_text: The best place to find answers to your Google classroom questions is at the Google Classroom help community Classroom Community That said, this is how you do it: Open the relevant classroomGo to PeopleIn the “Teacher” section of the people page, click on the person icon with the plus sign next to it, and type in the student’s gmail addressIf you want to remove them as a student, go to the “Student” section, tick the box next to their name, then click on the ‘Actions’ drop down menu and select ‘Remove’.
